Description: Calcite amulet in the form of a falcon; single piercing.
Cultures/periods: Naqada III (Late Predynastic or Early Dynastic)
Curator's comments: Illustrated in Hendrickx, S.; Friedman, R.F., and Eyckerman, M., 2011. Early falcons [in:] Morenz, L.D. and Kuhn, R. (eds.), Vorspann oder formative Phase ? Ägypten und der Vordere Orient 3500-2700 v. Chr. Philippika 48, Wiesbaden: fig. 11 a
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Rev Greville John Chester
